description: JK is an occult dowser who specializes in using dowsing rods to locate individuals. Like http://anidb.net/ch18061 [Kozue], he is also an occult manic and often accompanies the other characters when occult-related events occur. He is able to engage in combat using his dowsing rods, but usually calls for http://anidb.net/ch18058 [Smile] when in trouble.
name: JK
